Meta.title: Infinity Talisman
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod提供了一个BepInEX配置文件 sosarciel.infinitytalisman.cfg 允许你设置: PC无限灵符 NPC无限灵符 要求[灵符知识专长]才可无限灵符
此mod主要目的是解决阴阳师队友灵符问题, 原游戏所有NPC所会的法术均为无限储量, 但灵符依然需要消耗武器灵符储量
注意, 所有选项默认都不启用 你需要手动在游戏安装目录的BepInEX配置(如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.infinitytalisman.cfg") 内更改配置使其生效
This mod provides a BepInEX configuration file sosarciel.infinitytalisman.cfg that allows you to set the following options: Unlimited Talisman for PC Unlimited Talisman for NPC Require [Talisman Mastery] for unlimited Talisman
The primary purpose of this mod is to address the Talisman issue for Onmyoji companions. In the original game, all NPC spells have unlimited supply, but Talismans still consume weapon Talisman reserves.
Note: All options are disabled by default. You need to manually enable them by editing the configuration file in the game installation directory (e.g., SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.infinitytalisman.cfg).
